cartoonistGameXML.winText: Remove all of coins from the screen.
cartoonistGameXML.recipes:
Win: Remove all of coins from the screen.
Lose: When mushrooms gets too small.
cartoonistGameXML.gameConclusion: Having played this game, there is something you may have learned.
cartoonistGameXML.conceptMapSummary: A game where plumber eats mushrooms, plumber kills turtles, plumber collects coins, plumber saves princess, turtles kills plumber and mushrooms escapes plumber.
